summary: A documentary film showcasing life in postwar Japan as seen through the eyes of a bar hostess.
cast: Chieko Akaza|Etsuko Akaza|Tami Akaza|Fukumi Kuroda|Douglas MacArthur|Emiko Takada|Rikiya Yasuoka
keywords: japan|japanese new wave|prostitution|post world war two|post war
title: Historia del Japón de la postguerra: La vida de la camarera Onboro
